DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the prevalence of menstrual cycle related pain complains in adolescents and young adults.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Menstrual Cycle Related Pain Complains in Adolescents and Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: An internet questionnaire with 12 items was used: Adolescents - start of menstruation - characteristics of menstrual cycle - pain related to menstrual cycle (questions based on well-known pain-complaints related to the presence of endometriosis) - analgetics - influence on school carrier - influence on social life Young adults - idem as for adolescents - influence of pain on an eventual sexual relationship
DOC.criteria: 3rd year high school girls 1st year university young females premenarcheal girls
